channel.title: CVE Feed for kjd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kjd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3651|2024-07-07T17:22:10.032Z -- kjd -- kjd%2Fidna
item.description: A vulnerability was identified in the kjd/idna library, specifically within the `idna.encode()` function, affecting version 3.6. The issue arises from the function's handling of crafted input strings, which can lead to quadratic complexity and consequently, a denial of service condition. This vulnerability is triggered by a crafted input that causes the `idna.encode()` function to process the input with considerable computational load, significantly increasing the processing time in a quadratic manner relative to the input size.
